pr_title: 2181: Personnel File CSV Export Toughness, Status, and Portrait Path

timeline.message: 2181: Adding status and portrait to personnel table export and fixing toughness
Improving JTable export failure error message

timeline.bodyText: I've never seen curly braces with case statements before.
timeline.author: NickAragua

replies.bodyText: They are used in case statements to allow one to breakup the code for each case into segments. They are best implemented for long case statements as a readability improvement, a neater way than using regions for them.
replies.author: Windchild292
